name: Mantel Clock
maker: Clock movement by Étienne-Augustin Le Roy, and case by Etienne Martincourt
description: Mantel Clock; Clock movement by Étienne-Augustin Le Roy (French, 1737 - 1792, master 1758), and case by Etienne Martincourt (French, died after 1791, master 1762); Paris, France; about 1772; Gilt bronze; enameled metal; glass; 71.1 x 59.7 x 32.4 cm (28 x 23 1/2 x 12 3/4 in.); 73.DB.78; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Mantel Clock
